# Minutes in an Hour

> Number of minutes in an hour.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var MINUTES_IN_HOUR = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/minutes-in-hour' );
```

#### MINUTES_IN_HOUR

Number of minutes in an hour.

``` javascript
MINUTES_IN_HOUR === 60;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var MINUTES_IN_HOUR = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/minutes-in-hour' );

console.log( MINUTES_IN_HOUR );
// => 60
```
